mapper.select: select o.ord_id,c.clnt_nm, o.order_dt, u.name as userNm , o.dlvry_dt, i.item_num, i.item_nm, i.invnt_unit, o.ord_qty from client c join order_mng o on o.clnt_id = c.clnt_id join user u on o.user_id = u.user_id join item i on o.item_id = i.item_id where o.ord_id = #{ordId}

select o.ord_id, c.clnt_cd, c.clnt_nm, o.order_dt as sOdate, o.dlvry_dt as eDdate, u.id, u.name, o.ord_num from order_mng o join client c on o.clnt_id = c.clnt_id join user u on o.user_id = u.user_id order by sOdate desc limit #{startRow},#{pageSize}

select count(*) from item
where item_num like CONCAT('%', #{itemNum}, '%') and item_nm like CONCAT('%', #{itemNm}, '%')

select count(*) from user
where id like CONCAT('%', #{userNum}, '%') and name like CONCAT('%', #{userNm}, '%')

select count(*) from client
where clnt_cd like CONCAT('%', #{clntCd}, '%') and clnt_nm like CONCAT('%', #{clntNm}, '%')
mapper.update: update order_mng set ord_id= #{ordId}, clnt_id = #{clntId}, order_dt = #{orderDt}, user_id = #{userId}, dlvry_dt = #{dlvryDt}, item_id = #{itemId}, ord_qty = #{ordQty} where ord_id = #{ordId}
